title: ProfilingEvent
description: Structure holding information about a Profiling event

start.description: The profile start time in ISO 8601 UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z')

end.description: The profile end time in ISO 8601 UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z')

family.description: Profile family used by the backend to identify the profile type. For Perfetto, use "android".

version.description: Schema version of the event, only `4` is supported

tags_profiler.description: The list of tags joined into a String and divided by ','
